statements: DELETE FROM payment_data WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount > 500.00
DELETE FROM payment_data WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM financial_report WHERE total_profit < 5000 OR report_date > '2022-02-28';
DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 100 AND amount > 500
DELETE FROM orders WHERE quantity < 10 AND product_id = 200
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM sales WHERE sale_quantity < 5);
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2001 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201;
DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 501 AND amount > 1000;
